      • authorize

        @GetMapping("/oauth2/authorize")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView authorize()
        Method for calling the home connect authorization endpoint
        Returns:
        RedirectView to the Home Connect authorization page

      • code

        @GetMapping("/oauth2/code")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView code​(@RequestParam("code")
                                                         java.lang.String code,
                                                         @RequestParam(value="grant_type",required=false)
                                                         java.lang.String grantType,
                                                         @RequestParam(value="state",required=false)
                                                         java.lang.String state)
        Method for processing the authorization answer from the home connect api
        Parameters:
        code - authorization code
        grantType - all granted access points
        state - individual code string for security purpose
        Returns:
        ModelAndView to token method

      • token

        @GetMapping("/oauth2/token")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView token()
        Method for token request. This method will be called after the authorization answer from the home connect api
        Returns:
        ModelAndView settings

      • tokenRefresh

        @GetMapping("/oauth2/refresh")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView tokenRefresh()
        Method for refreshing the access token. The access token is 24h valid
        Returns:
        ModelAndView settings

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView save​(@ModelAttribute

        Method for saving the home connect settings
        Parameters:
        oAuth2Provider - object with connection settings
        Returns:
        ModelAndView settings
